channel.title: Mario Yanes' Portfolio on Mario Yanes
channel.description: Recent content in Mario Yanes' Portfolio on Mario Yanes

item.title: Translate with R (I): libretranslateR for offline translations
item.description: Some weeks ago, a colleague of mine asked me if I knew any R package to translate some dataframes she wanted to have in different languages.

item.title: Unwrapping link's redirection with R and Shiny
item.description: There are public portals like WhereGoes where you introduce a link and they show you all the hopes the request does.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Listed in this page you can find the different projects I’ve been working on, ones are mantained (or in progress) :green_circle:, and other(s) the development may stop or is stopped :red_circle:.
